name: 莫娜·图加尔
introduction: Mona Tougaard (born 3 April 2002) is a Danish fashion model. She was born in Aarhus, Denmark, and is of Danish, Somali, Ethiopian, and Turkish descent. She was scouted at age 12, and won the Elite Model Look Denmark contest when she was 15 and was a finalist in the global competition. Tougaard debuted as a Prada exclusive in 2019. Between two seasons she opened for Loewe and Fendi, also walking for Chanel, Louis Vuitton, Stella McCartney, Valentino, Miu Miu, Versace, Burberry, Dior, Victoria Beckham, Max Mara, Lanvin (which she closed), Salvatore Ferragamo, Alberta Ferretti, Givenchy, Dries Van Noten, Paco Rabanne, Chloé, and Saint Laurent among 40 shows. She has appeared in advertisements for Prada, Louis Vuitton, Loewe, Chanel, and Max Mara.
